The discovery of a silver ring with an Arabic inscription in a Viking grave has added credence to the ancient accounts of Arab travellers in their encounters with the Vikings, and points to a fascinating trade and cultural exchange.

Dolphins hunted to pay for brides - If you want a bride in a few Solomon Island villages, you need to pay with necklaces of dolphins’ teeth. And the price has shot up alarmingly since 2004, from $0.14 per tooth to $0.68—as has the number of dolphins slaughtered for this purpose, scientists report
